module.name: timestamp_gen
module.description: The timestamp Generator is a SpartanMC peripheral for generating precise timestamps. Therefore it has two 36bit time values: one representing the current time in seconds and one with the exact clock cycle within this second. To get exact values it has a configurable amount of input lines and on a rising edge on this lines the current timer value is stored into a fifo queue. For non interrupt peripherals it is also possible to read the current timer value.
